text: Uwe Flade is a German music video director and entrepreneur. He has directed videos for many artists, such as a-ha, Depeche Mode, Franz Ferdinand, In Extremo, Nickelback and Rammstein. He also created worldwide successful apps for kids like nighty night and little box music box with Egmont Mayer, Heidi Wittlinger and Grit Schuster.
